DOC.brief_summary: Programming Deep Brain Stimulation for the treatment of Essential Tremor can be a time intensive process. Using an atlas created using functional tremor responses in the operating room to determine the optimal settings would lead to a faster response for the patient and improved quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: Atlas Predicted DBS Settings in Essential Tremor
DOC.criteria: Seleced for DBS of the VIM nucleus at Vanderbilt Medical center Diagnosis of essential tremor Unable to use the patient handheld programmer
